perturbation.original_text:
(c) "Brand Features" means each party's respective trademarks, trade names,
service marks, service names and distinct brand elements that appear from time
to time in each party's properties, ventures and services worldwide and are
protected under U.S. copyright law or as to which each party has established
trademarks or trade dress rights and any modifications to the foregoing that may
be created during the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
(c) "Brand Features" means each party's respective trademarks, trade names,
service marks, service names and distinct brand elements that appear from time
to time in each party's properties, ventures and services worldwide and are
protected under U.S. copyright law or as to which each party has established
trademarks or trade dress rights; The Brand Features are explicitly limited to only registered trademarks and copyrighted logos that are actively used and displayed on the main website of each party. Any modifications to the foregoing that may
be created during the term of this Agreement are excluded.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Brand Features' is broad, encompassing trademarks, trade names, and distinct brand elements protected under U.S. copyright law or established trademark rights. The modified definition introduces a contradiction by limiting 'Brand Features' to only actively used and displayed registered trademarks and copyrighted logos on the main website, explicitly excluding any modifications made during the agreement's term. This contradiction could lead to disputes over which elements qualify as 'Brand Features' and are therefore subject to the agreement's branding provisions, especially if a party uses unregistered trademarks or modifies their brand elements during the term.

perturbation.original_text:
(u) "Specifications" shall mean the specifications for the Manifest set
forth on Exhibit D, as updated from time to time during the term of this
Agreement in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
(u) "Specifications" shall mean the specifications for the Manifest set
forth on Exhibit D, which are considered fixed and not subject to updates during the term of this agreement, unless both parties execute a formal amendment to this agreement specifying the exact changes to Exhibit D. Any verbal agreement or email correspondence regarding potential updates shall not be legally binding.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition allows for the Specifications (Exhibit D) to be updated from time to time during the agreement's term. The modified definition contradicts this by stating that the Specifications are fixed and not subject to updates unless through a formal written amendment. This creates ambiguity and potential disputes about whether changes to the Manifest's functionality or technical requirements are permissible without a formal amendment, even if updates are discussed or implemented informally.

perturbation.original_text:
(a) Updates and Service Revisions. The Company will make Updates to the
Service in accordance with the requirements set forth in the Specifications at
no charge for the entire term of this Agreement. Without limiting the foregoing,
the Service shall be updated from time to time during the term of this Agreement
to include accurate and current (i) Listings and (ii) pricing and service
descriptions for each carrier supported by the Manifest, in each case as soon as
reasonably practicable following the receipt by the Company of such Listings,
pricing and service descriptions. As reasonably necessary, the Company shall
update the Specifications to reflect such Updates and shall provide a copy of
same to MBE at least once per calendar quarter. If the Company develops
additional Intellectual Property Rights that are made available without
development charge to other customers of the Company, the Company will also make
such Intellectual Property Rights available to MBE without development charge.
perturbation.changed_text:
(a) Updates and Service Revisions. The Company will make Updates to the
Service in accordance with the requirements set forth in the Specifications at
no charge for the initial year of this Agreement. Any further Updates after the first year will be subject to a separate fee schedule negotiated in good faith by both parties. Without limiting the foregoing,
the Service may be updated from time to time during the term of this Agreement
to include accurate and current (i) Listings and (ii) pricing and service
descriptions for each carrier supported by the Manifest, in each case as soon as
reasonably practicable following the receipt by the Company of such Listings,
pricing and service descriptions. As reasonably necessary, the Company shall
update the Specifications to reflect such Updates and shall provide a copy of
same to MBE at least once per calendar quarter. If the Company develops
additional Intellectual Property Rights that are made available without
development charge to other customers of the Company, the Company will also make
such Intellectual Property Rights available to MBE at market rate charge, not free.
perturbation.explanation: The original text says updates will be at no charge for the entire term. The modification contradicts this in the first sentence by stating that updates are free only for the first year, and beyond that require a separate fee schedule. It also says that additional Intellectual Property Rights that are made available without development charge to other customers of the Company, the Company will also make such Intellectual Property Rights available to MBE at market rate charge, not free. This introduces uncertainty and opens the door to potential disagreements over the cost of maintaining and improving the Service, thereby creating Ambiguities.
